category: Management group operation regulations/Article 5 (Obligations of member group officials, etc.)
contents: Article 5 (Obligations of member organization officials, etc.) ① Member organization officials designated as management organizations must comply with the instructions of the Sports Council and request advice from the Sports Council, including providing all knowledge and information necessary for various decision-making and business performance of the Sports Council. must actively cooperate. Revised on October 6, 2021. ② Member organization officials must support all matters including procurement of expenses and provision of office space necessary for carrying out the business of the sports conference management organization. Revised 2021. 10. 6. ③ The Sports Council may immediately refer to disciplinary procedures any member organization official who interferes with the performance of the Sports Council's management group duties. Revised on October 6, 2021. ④ Member organization officials must actively strive to normalize the member organization as soon as possible. Revised 2021. 10. 6. [Title revised 2021. 10. 6.]
